english: It has no discernible effect on spondylitis .
chinese: 这对脊椎炎无明显影响。

english: Endometritis is a cause of infertility .
chinese: 子宫内膜炎是不育的原子。

english: An inflammatory exudate collects on the surface .
chinese: 炎性渗出物集合在表面。
有症状的十二指肠憩室炎罕见。

english: Paul was laid up with an attack of bronchitis .
chinese: 保罗支气管炎发作，病倒了。
炎造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Only one third of the patients have phlebitis .
chinese: 仅有三分之一的病人有静脉炎。
葡萄球菌性小肠结肠炎是一少见疾病。

english: Obstruction of the bile duct is associated with cholangitis .
chinese: 胆管梗阻能并发胆管炎。

english: The most lethal complication is fulminating colitis .
chinese: 最严重的致死性并发症是暴发性结肠炎。

english: In 50 percent there was endocarditis and/or pancreatitis .
chinese: 50病例中有心内膜炎和（或）胰腺炎。

english: Paul was rather a delicate boy, subject to bronchitis .
chinese: 保罗是个相当娇弱的孩子，容易患支气管炎。

english: A few fatal cases of postinfectious encephalitis have been reported .
chinese: 曾有几例病后脑炎致死的报道。

english: Not all cases of otitis external respond well to treatment .
chinese: 不是所有外耳炎的病例对治疗都有良好效应。
